page.title: 14RELIGION IN BACK
page.content: Religion plays a great part in the lives of native islanders. {THE FREE CHURCH } The indigenous population belong to the{FREE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND. The Free Church is a conservative, Calvinistic,off-shoot of the Church of Scotland. {SUNDAY (LATHA NA SABAID) On Sundays there are services both morning and evening, besides several weekly evening services. Great emphasis is placed on Sabbath Observance.None of the ordinary weekday activities are carried out in public.Only the Bible and other such books should be read.The television and radio are also frowned upon.There are no washing lines to be seen,no organized sporting activities,no shops are open and no agricultural work is done.
